title: The Detective Boys' Pursuit of the Purse-snatcher

infobox.Title:: The Detective Boys' Pursuit of the Purse-snatcher
infobox.Japanese title:: 探偵団の引ったくり大追跡  (Tantei-dan no Hittakuri Dai Tsuiseki)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Ai Haibara  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Akinori Egoshi as Koichi Samura  Ikuji Nose as Katsumi Togane  Yoko Imaizumi as Sakie Setoguchi  Akira Murayama as Shosaku Kume

sections.Situation:
Ayumi sees a mysterious man running with a bag. 10 minutes later, an old man named Shousaku Kume says that someone robbed his bag that cointained 300 thousand yen.

Later, when the police arrive, a Cheetah Delivery employee asks for help because he found a body in an apartment near the robbery.

The victim, Koichi Samura, was an extorter who blackmailed many people. Later, his friend, Katsumi Togane is found poisoned in an Izakaya at Haido City.

It seems that Togane killed himself after robbing Kume and killing Samura. But is this really the case?

- The beer "Union" drunk by Togane is in fact "Asahi Super Dry".
- Anime-original location: Tamake City (玉毛市).
